mapper.select: SELECT card_name, card_type FROM card_product WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT cp.id, cp.card_name, cp.card_type, cp.card_info, cp.register_date, cp.state, COUNT(ci.card_id) AS count FROM card_product cp LEFT JOIN card_issued ci ON cp.id = ci.card_id GROUP BY cp.id

SELECT i.id AS id, card_name, card_type, request_date, user_name, user_birth, user_tel FROM card_issued AS i INNER JOIN card_product AS p ON i.card_id = p.id INNER JOIN user AS u ON i.user_id = u.id WHERE i.state = "WATING" ORDER BY request_date
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO card_application_approval(card_issued_id, approval_date) VALUES (#{id}, now())
INSERT INTO card_canceled(card_issued_id, request_date) VALUES (#{id}, now())
mapper.select: SELECT c.id AS id, i.card_number AS card_number, p.card_name AS card_name, p.card_type AS card_type, c.request_date AS request_date, u.user_name AS user_name, u.user_birth AS user_birth, u.user_tel AS user_tel, c.cancel_date AS cancel_date FROM card_canceled AS c INNER JOIN card_issued AS i ON c.card_issued_id = i.id INNER JOIN card_product AS p ON i.card_id = p.id INNER JOIN user AS u ON u.id = i.user_id
mapper.update: UPDATE card_issued SET state = "CANCELED" WHERE id = (SELECT c.card_issued_id AS id FROM card_canceled AS c WHERE c.id = #{id})
mapper.select: SELECT i.id AS id, i.card_number AS card_number, p.card_type AS card_type FROM card_issued AS i INNER JOIN card_product AS p ON i.card_id = p.id WHERE user_id = #{id} ORDER BY expiration_date

SELECT MIN(t.payment_date) AS payment_date, t.approval_number AS approval_number, s.business_number AS business_number, s.store_name AS store_name, s.business_type AS business_type, t.installment AS installment, t.card_charge AS card_charge, MIN(IF(t.installment > n.installment_months , t.card_charge * (n.interest_rate/100), null)) AS interest_bee FROM transaction AS t INNER JOIN store AS s ON t.store_id = s.id INNER JOIN card_issued AS i ON i.id = t.card_issued_id INNER JOIN installment AS n ON n.card_id = i.card_id WHERE card_issued_id IN (SELECT i.id FROM card_issued AS i WHERE i.user_id = #{id} AND i.id = #{cardIssuedId} ) AND YEAR(t.payment_date) = #{yearChoice} AND MONTH(t.payment_date) = #{monthChoice} GROUP BY t.approval_number, s.business_number, s.store_name, s.business_type, t.installment, t.card_charge
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO payment(payer, target_id, target_year, target_month, payment, payment_date, payment_state) VALUES (#{payer}, #{targetId}, #{targetYear}, #{targetMonth}, #{payment}, now(), #{paymentState})
